title: co op vs ai enemy all chat
body: The game usually has bots say something in the start of a game and at the end of a game, well 1 random champion on the enemy team seems to be chosen to say all of the quotes now. Olaf ended a match saying "Imagine if I had a real weapon" while he has axes which are a real weapon, the enemy team had a jax bot.

replies.body: Yes, that has been broken for a while now. Co-op vs AI doesn't get much attention, unfortunately.
